attributes.action: abandon plans to waste even more of taxpayers' money on subsidising politcal parties.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Political parties are but a means to an end of democracy, not an end in themselves. If parties are to exist, they must engage the public and not wallow in the complacency that subsidy would permit. And public subsidies for existing parties would be undemocratic as they would merely encourage the status quo and be a barrier to the development of new parties or groupings.
